documents.document: @dixieland01 lol I have thought about getting red paint and making blood splatter patterns around the place
@dixieland01 lol that's why there's a skeleton in the corner of the garden and a small coffin lol
@dixieland01 Yeah that's partly why I choose that place. Less work to do straight away lol
@BradEYoung that is sad. ðŸ™
@dixieland01 lol its just right ðŸ˜Š yeah there's a lot I want to do but it's all really expensive. Will wait before doing any renovations
@dixieland01 it's small but it's mine ðŸ˜Š no more.landlord
@dixieland01 umm there might be some but I can send you some when I get home
@dixieland01 sadly no. It's about an hours drive from where I was. But still nice. Going in october/November.
@dixieland01 I've also brought a house and have changed my mind about going to the USA. Going to Vietnam & Cambodia to escape my 40th
@dixieland01 Yeah me too. Shame your not all better though.
@dixieland01 oh dear ðŸ™ so back to crutches etc again. I had my surgery. A small bit of nerve damage but otherwise a success
@dixieland01 hey ðŸ˜Š how's things going?
@isamuel @LaQuishaStR I'm not an American but I thank you for your offer
@donttrythis feel free to say what you like. I believe it's called freedom of speech. NZ stands with #MuslimBanprotest
I wish I was marching with you #MuslimBanprotest stay strong & keep it up. The world is watching. NZ stands with you against the prejudice
@vodafoneNZ is there some sort of outage as my WiFi is down
@BrillCorey hahaha I decided to spend my 40th in Vietnam and Cambodia instead of walker stalker Atlanta. ðŸ˜Š now it's a 10 month wait lol
@BrillCorey I'm so sad for America right now. I was going to visit this year but I just bring myself to visit a trump America.

On my way to work after earthquakes and flooding. With these 6 pointer after shocks I am a bit nervous about it.
@JoshMcDermitt @EW I may have missed bits as there were a few aftershocks at the time. Best part of my birthday was wa5ching #twd
@ChrisHarrelson it's what I would. Love.to do for a living lol
So yesterday was my birthday where we had earthquakes & aftershocks. Today is wind, rain & flooding.
@wwwbigbaldhead I have had to keep pausing as we have been having a few aftershocks today after a major earthquake
@jwoodsrobinson @WalkingDead_AMC sure!! Between after shocks & in New Zealand time. I will get the remote in hand to pause when taking cover
@ANNIEMOHO between after shocks all good. Had to grab phone and remote to pause lol
@JDMorgan wonderful. Not only is today good cos it's twd day but it's also my birthday. Did not like starting it with a major earthquake
@ChrisHarrelson thanks. It's worse down south. Just after shocks now
@CWiZombie @RahulKohli13 happy birthday!! It's my birthday today too. The day started with a big earthquake here in NZ
Happy walking dead day #TWDFamily it also is my birthday today woohooo. Thanks to the earthquakes we have just had I have the day off.
@77Soniam also earth a good birthday present would be a rainbow or something like that thanks.
All ok here after a bunch of pretty good earthquakes. But I would love to go back to sleep now, so just stop it now earth
@sawoodard @DoctoroftheDead well we do have ash vs. Evil dead that is filmed here. ðŸ˜‰ trust your wife. Or come for a holiday
@DoctoroftheDead @sawoodard if you get the chance to interview Rose McIver you can chat to her about it. She's a kiwi ðŸ˜Š
@DoctoroftheDead @sawoodard we welcome anyone with open arms and will offer you a place to sleep if need be
@DoctoroftheDead @sawoodard oh you so should!! I love my little country. And you will find out what kiwi hospitality is all about.
@DoctoroftheDead @sawoodard come to NZ. You will find us quite welcoming ðŸ˜Š
